Title: Relates to allowing a nursing home patient to install an electronic monitoring device in his or her room
Summary: Relates to allowing a nursing home patient, or his or her representative, to install, operate and maintain, at his or her own expense, an electronic monitoring device in his or her room.
LawCode: Amd ยง2803-c, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to authorizing a nursing home patient to install, operate and maintain an electronic monitoring device in his or her room
